screen shot attached

Hi Team,
I was trying to do the record in our admin site but the problem is like when i set the proxy and start recording, and then I refresh the page what I can see is the next page is not getting loaded and the j-meter goes to infinite loop. This is I checked in explorer 9 and when i tried the same thing chrome or mozila it asks for user authentication. I gave my user id and password but again it asks for user authentication and in the j-meter site the result is same as it is. When we stop recording i can the chrome browser displays 401 unauthorized error message.

I tried to resolve the issue in several ways but couldn't do it. Request you to please have a look on the same and reply me as soon as possible. Thanks in advance!!

Note: screen shot have been attached.
